value.title: Hyundai Motor invests $50m in Canadian AI chip startup Tenstorrent

value.title: AI chip firm Tenstorrent raises $100 million from Hyundai, Samsung

value.title: AMD mulls making AI chip for China
value.excerpt: AMD has an opportunity to build AI solutions for customers in China and is working in that direction, company president and CEO Lisa Su said in a company earnings call on Tuesday.

value.title: AMD to develop slower AI GPUs for Chinese market to comply with US restrictions

value.title: Gamers, brace yourselves: AI development could lead to another GPU shortage
value.excerpt: The rise in AI tools and chatbots may be exciting for many, but gamers and enthusiasts could soon be getting cryptomining flashbacks. A few years ago the crypto-mining craze gobbled up gaming GPUs, and it looks like history could be (sort of) repeating as businesses begin buying up consumer GPUs to manufacture their artificial intelligence tools.

value.title: U.S. lawmakers urge Biden administration to tighten AI chip export rules
value.excerpt: Two U.S. lawmakers who head a committee focused on China on Friday urged the Biden administration to tighten export restrictions on artificial intelligence chips in the wake of industry lobbying to leave the rules unchanged.

value.title: Chip Giant TSMC Determined To 'Keep Roots In Taiwan': CEO
value.excerpt: Semiconductor giant TSMC said it was determined to "keep its roots in Taiwan" as it launched a massive facility in the island's north on Friday geared towards developing the world's most cutting-edge microchips.

value.title: Taiwan Semiconductor's Sales Are Down -- Even With the AI Boom
value.excerpt: Investors have bid up computer chip stocks such as TSMC this year on the back of the artificial intelligence (AI) boom, which requires an immense amount of computing power to train and run. The iShares Semiconductor ETF is up 47.5% in 2023, outpacing the S&P 500 's (still impressive) return of 19%.
